turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a grande Caramel Cloud Macchiato from Starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright I can assist you with that, which location are you interested in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes the one on Fountain Dr. in Charlotte NC

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay I have the location pulled up, did you want to add a specific pick up time?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually yes make my pick up time for 10:00 am

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright so I have a Caramel Cloud Macchiato, what size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande please, and add whip cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. So I have a grande Caramel Cloud Macchiato with whip cream for a 10 am pick up, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright and will you be paying in cash or card?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Cash

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright and can I have a name for the order

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Tiffany Ronin

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright one moment while I place your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No problem.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright I have successfully placed your order would you like your confirmation number?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes please

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: got it thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem is there anything else I can assist you with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Well it was my pleasure thank you for using chat bot, have a great day

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: like wise bye
